rows.label: qst300302_msg001
rows.name: 面接開始！

rows.label: qst300302_msg002
rows.name: 面接後

rows.label: qst300302_msg003
rows.name: 答え合わせ・両方当たり

rows.label: qst300302_msg004
rows.name: 答え合わせ・片方当たり

rows.label: qst300302_msg005
rows.name: 答え合わせ・全部ハズレ

rows.label: qst300302_msg006
rows.name: クエスト完了

rows.label: qst300302_msg0001
rows.name:
Right then, then let's start the
interviews, shall we? All set?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0011
rows.name: Start interviewing?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0012
rows.name: I'm ready!

rows.label: qst300302_msg0013
rows.name: Give me a second...

rows.label: qst300302_msg0014
rows.name:
OK, I'm calling in candidate number
one.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0015
rows.name: All right. Just don't take too long.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0051
rows.name:
I'd like to have Rex handle the
interviews, if possible.
Could you bring him, perhaps?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0101
rows.name:
All right, you've heard their appeals.
Who do you think's best for the job?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0102
rows.name:
First, there's Fisena. She's sure to bring
something new and fresh to the mercs.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0103
rows.name:
Then there's Powapowa, the Nopon. She
struck me as cool and level-headed.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0104
rows.name:
And lastly, Zengrid, the former noble.
He seems perfectly respectable.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0121
rows.name: Who should I choose?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0122
rows.name: Fisena

rows.label: qst300302_msg0123
rows.name: Powapowa

rows.label: qst300302_msg0124
rows.name: Zengrid

rows.label: qst300302_msg0151
rows.name: Then it's settled.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0152
rows.name:
Having a capable woman on board's
sure to raise the crew's morale.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0153
rows.name:
We all get a bit tetchy after a long
day of battle. She's sure to calm the
crew down.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0154
rows.name:
He's a bit of an oddball, but I'd be
more than welcome to let him handle
our financial matters.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0171
rows.name: Yep, I think we're onto a winner here!

rows.label: qst300302_msg0172
rows.name:
Y'know, sometimes you get a look in
your eye that reminds me of Vandham.
You're really taking to being in charge.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0173
rows.name: If only the Big Man could see you now.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0174
rows.name:
Here's to the Hræsvelgr Mercs and
to the bright future ahead of us!

rows.label: qst300302_msg0175
rows.name:
Someday we'll be the best damn
mercs in Invidia... No, in the whole
of Alst!

rows.label: qst300302_msg0176
rows.name:
Remember to stop by when you're
passing through!
